metadata.title: Subscribe - Capsule Note
metadata.description: Choose your plan and start writing letters to your future self

hero.title: Choose Your Capsule
hero.description: Two simple yearly plans. No free tier, no ads—just dependable deliveries to your future self (and others).

emailCapture.heading: Enter Your Email
emailCapture.description: This email will be used for payment and account creation.
emailCapture.lockedNotice: It cannot be changed after payment (locked for security).

emailLocked.title: Email Locked
emailLocked.description: Your email {email} will be used for payment and account creation. This cannot be changed after payment for security reasons.

incomplete.title: Incomplete Payment
incomplete.description: You have an incomplete payment for {plan} plan. You can resume your checkout by selecting a plan below.

error.title: Error
error.description: There was an issue with your subscription. Please contact support if this persists.

digital.name: Digital Capsule
digital.description: For personal letters to yourself—purely digital delivery.

paper.name: Paper & Pixels
paper.description: For gifting and tangible keepsakes—email plus premium mail.

alreadyPaid.title: Payment already completed
alreadyPaid.description: Please sign up to activate your subscription

checkoutFailed.title: Failed to start checkout
checkoutFailed.description: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

metadata.title: Payment Successful - Capsule Note
metadata.description: Your payment was successful. Complete your signup to activate your subscription.

paymentNotComplete.title: Payment Not Complete
paymentNotComplete.description: Your payment has not been completed yet. Please check your email for payment instructions or try again.

success.subscriptionActivated: Your subscription to {planName} has been activated.
success.startWriting: You can now start writing letters to your future self.
success.headToDashboard: Head to your dashboard to write your first letter.

unableToRetrieveEmail.title: Unable to Retrieve Email
unableToRetrieveEmail.description: We couldn't retrieve your email from the payment session. Please contact support with session ID: {sessionId}

completeSignup.title: Complete Your Signup
completeSignup.description: Create your account to activate your subscription

success.paymentProcessed: Your payment for {planName} has been processed. Complete your signup below to activate your subscription.
success.securityNotice: You must verify your email address before your subscription is activated. Check your inbox for a verification email.

emailForm.label: Email Address
emailForm.helper: Your email will be used for payment and account creation only. Email cannot be changed after payment (locked for security).

error.invalid: Please enter a valid email address

metadata.title: Payment Error - Capsule Note
metadata.description: There was an issue with your payment. Please try again or contact support.

payment_failed.title: Payment Failed
payment_failed.description: Your payment could not be processed. This could be due to insufficient funds, an expired card, or other payment issues. Please check your payment method and try again.

session_expired.title: Checkout Session Expired
session_expired.description: Your checkout session has expired for security reasons. Sessions are valid for 24 hours. Please start a new checkout to subscribe.

email_mismatch.title: Email Mismatch
email_mismatch.description: The email address in your checkout session doesn't match your account. For security, you must sign in with the same email used for payment.

email_not_verified.title: Email Not Verified
email_not_verified.description: You must verify your email address before your subscription can be activated. Check your inbox for a verification email from Capsule Note.

pending_subscription_not_found.title: Subscription Not Found
pending_subscription_not_found.description: We couldn't find your pending subscription. This might mean it has expired or was already activated. Please contact support if you believe this is an error.

unknown.title: Something Went Wrong
unknown.description: An unexpected error occurred during checkout. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.
